DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate diagnostic efficacy Gadobutrol versus Gadobenate dimeglumine similar dose 0.1mmol/kg assessment myocardial infarction delay enhancement cardiac Magnetic Resonance Imaging
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Gadobutrol Gadobenate Dimeglumin Delayed Enhancement Cardiac MRI
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis myocardial infarction Age ≥ 18 year ≤ 80 year Informed consent Male patient well female patient use contraceptive Patients heart pacemaker , magnetic material magnetic implant . Renal failure ( GFR < 30ml/min ) Patients know allergy Gadoliniumcontaining contrast agent Drugs alcohol addiction , dementia
